m_szDocTitle: Who You Are — EV Enthusiast Profile | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Who You Are — EV Enthusiast Profile January 25th, 2016 by Zachary Shahan   In our third article pulled from  Electric Cars: What Early Adopters & First Followers Want  — a new report from  CleanTechnica ,  EV Obsession , and GAS2  — I’m jumping into who the respondents of the surveys were. Given that our readers were primarily the respondents, this is basically a look at who you are. One of the four surveys was directed only at current EV owners and lessees (also referred to “EV drivers” in parts of of this report). Two of the four surveys were directed at both EV drivers and potential EV buye
